description: An element that is referable by its idShort. This id is not globally unique. This id is unique within the name space of the element.
comment: According Platform Industrie 4.0. Details of Asset Administration Shell (Version 3.0) Part 1 Release Candidate 02

contents.name: idShort
contents.description: In case of identifiables this attribute is a short name of the element. In case of referable this id is an identifying string of the element within its name space.

contents.name: displayName
contents.description: Display name. Can be provided in several languages.

contents.name: category
contents.description: The category is a value that gives further meta information w.r.t. to the class of the element. It affects the expected existence of attributes and the applicability of constraints.

contents.name: description
contents.description: Description or comments on the element. The description can be provided in several languages.

contents.name: checksum
contents.description: Checksum to be used to determine if an Referable (including its aggregated child elements) has changed.The checksum is calculated by the userâ€™s tool environment. The checksum has no semantic meaning for an Asset Administration Shell model and there is no requirement for Asset Administration Shell tools to manage the checksum.

contents.name: tags
contents.comment: Not part of the AAS meta model. Makes querying easier. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/digital-twins/how-to-use-tags
